entry.def: Your bloodstream is the blood that flows around your body.

example.ex: The disease releases toxins into the bloodstream.
example.tran: 这种病会释放毒素到血液中。

means.word_mean: 1. the blood flowing through the circulatory system

sentences.en: Bacteria was introduced into his bloodstream through an unsterile needle.
